TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type DesignerRegionCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，以及任何衍生的類別，會使用類別來包含和列舉在設計主應用程式，控制項設計工具區域，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class, and any derived class, uses the class to contain and enumerate the designer regions for the control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 比方說，方法可用來定義並將區域新增至集合。For example, the method can be used to define and add regions to the collection. 使用屬性來存取包含設計工具區域集合的控制項設計工具物件。Use the property to access the control designer object that contains the designer region collection. 使用方法和屬性來檢查並維護集合中的物件。Use the methods and properties to examine and maintain the objects that are in the collection. 加入物件時，以動態方式增加集合。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 這個集合中的索引都是以零為起始的。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用來判斷多少的設計工具區域集合中的屬性。Use the property to determine how many designer regions are in the collection. 使用成員提供下列功能：Use the members to provide the following functionality: - 方法，將單一的設計工具區域加入至集合。The method to add a single designer region to the collection. - 方法來加入集合中的特定索引處的設計工具區域。The method to add a designer region at a particular index within the collection. - 方法移除設計工具區域。The method to remove a designer region. - 方法移除特定索引處的設計工具區域。The method to remove the designer region at a particular index. - 方法，以判斷特定的設計工具區域是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular designer region is already in the collection. - 方法來擷取設計工具區域集合中的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a designer region within the collection. - 来取得或設定設計工具區域中使用陣列標記法的特定索引處的索引子。The indexer to get or set the designer region at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法從集合移除所有設計工具區域。The method to remove all designer regions from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會建立空的集合，並設定至指定的控制項設計工具物件的屬性。The constructor creates an empty collection and sets the property to the specified control designer object. 視覺效果設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用建構函式來初始化特定的控制項設計工具的設計工具區域集合。The visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the constructor to initialize a designer region collection for a specific control designer. 可以透過將項目新增至集合或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷使用的相等方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法會執行線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成正比屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 範本區域集合通常都很小，因為並不重要的線性搜尋作業的效能。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用於決定上限索引時逐一查看集合中的物件。The property is commonly used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為位於索引`0`中的索引處的最後一個元素，而且`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不本質上是安全執行緒程序透過集合列舉。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 這在列舉期間造成例外狀況。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 使用中鎖定集合以確保執行緒安全性在整個列舉期間的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引子來擷取集合中的指定索引處的區域，或在集合中的指定索引處設定的區域。Use the indexer to retrieve the region at the specified index within the collection or to set the region at the specified index within the collection. 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，您可以在此索引中的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`DesignerRegions(i)`的 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`DesignerRegions[i]`適用於 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `DesignerRegions(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `DesignerRegions[i]` for C#. 當您有區域物件的參考，而且需要在集合中物件的索引時，使用方法。When you have a reference to the region object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供便利的方式存取設計工具區域集合的控制項設計工具物件。The property provides a convenient means to access the control designer object for a designer region collection. 例如，您可以使用屬性來判斷擁有集合的控制項設計工具的型別，以及存取的屬性和方法的控制項設計工具。For example, you can use the property to determine the type of control designer that owns the collection and to access the properties and methods of the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除集合中的第一個指定的區域。The method removes the first occurrence of the specified region from the collection. 如果物件不包含指定`region`，集合會保持不變。If the object does not contain the specified `region`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 方法會判斷使用的相等方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the object. 方法會執行線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成正比屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 範本區域集合通常都很小，因為並不重要的線性搜尋作業的效能。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的區域，使用方法。To remove a region at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合移除所有區域，請使用方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，在集合中的後續項目索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
